=Mobile Currency Reader=


==Overview==

This mobile currency reader project intends to make tasks such as recognizing the values of different dollar bills easier for visually impaired people.

----

==Technical Overview==

1. Acquire image from Android + write to buffer
2. Phone client process + server process
3. Output text to audio
4. Classification of image data + rescale image
5. Deploy java program to Android
